title: Can Yasuo still ult people with airborn jumps?
body: Jax, zac, Quinn bounce, Tristaana etc.

replies.body: He cannot. Yasuo's ult can be cast when Yasuo, or one of his allies, moves an enemy champion, whether knockback or knockup. It can't however be used off effects that enemies use on themselves that put them into the air.

You're committed to these boards at such a late hour on a Friday.

You sir, get an upvote.

http://i.imgur.com/jRlqbAe.gif
What about Ziggs? I ask because his satchel seems like it could be an edge case

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WenNj9t9,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-10-10T06:49:49.994+0000)
>
> He cannot. Yasuo's ult can be cast when Yasuo, or one of his allies, moves an enemy champion, whether knockback or knockup. It can't however be used off effects that enemies use on themselves that put them into the air.

Are you sure?

I've had a few times that I used Dark Flight as Aatrox and had a Yasuo jump me mid-flight.

Ever since then, I've been hesitant to use that ability around Yasuo.

Wish I could get a video of it.
you probably got knocked up but didn't notice it because aatrox is already up.

it actually did, there was a patch where quinn E was bugged (more than usual) and yasuo could ult her when she used it near him

considering how bugged yasuo's ult has been historically it isn't even surprising (rip the patch where he could ult while dead lol)
It never happened to me, though I didn't see Quinn on the field unless I played her and Yasuo was a rare pick too.
To be honest, that happened in the first iteration of Yasuo but got obviously removed: on a playtest Yasuo VS Jax the latter could not use the Q without Yasuo going full HASAKI on him :D
now that you mention it, yasuo should be able to ult a floating syndra whenever he wants

Self-airborne moves are neglected by Yasuo's ult, so no.

But this logic doe. Yasuo can ult onto a Gragas's E, but can't ult when Tristana uses W.

Gameplay > logic

I mean, else you would automatically lose lane nami vs brand
No. Tried with Kha's jump and it didn't work. It made me sad.
